title: ELP - Brain Salad Surgery1973 (Deluxe){2008}[EAC - FLAC](oan)
description:
Emerson, Lake & Palmer - Brain Salad Surgery1973 (Deluxe Ed){2008} [EAC - FLAC] (oan)



2008 UK &#039;35th Anniversary Deluxe Edition&#039; 3-CD album set - Released in 1973,
Brain Salad Surgery was the fourth studio album by progressive rock band Emerson,
Lake & Palmer, and the first under their Manticore Records imprint.
This 2008 edition of &#039;Brain Salad Surgery&#039; comes expanded with Bonus Recordings
as well as 5.1 mix of the album as a SACD Disc. Presented in a deluxe packaging complete with
picture booklet containing extensive sleevenotes, rare photos & memorbillia.
